S04n349:1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāstāmanuśāsanīmanusmaran taṃ sarvasattvaparipākayathāśayasaṃcodanakuśalamūlasaṃbhavabodhisattvavimokṣaṃ paribhāvayan vipulīkurvan anupūrveṇa yena lumbinīvanaṃ tenopajagāma |
S04n349:2: upetya lumbinīvanaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyaṃ lumbinīvanadevatāṃ parigaveṣamāṇo'paśyatsutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyaṃ lumbinīdevatāṃ lumbinīvaneṣu sarvaratnadrumaśākhāmaṇḍalakūṭāgāre maṇipadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇāṃ viṃśatyā vanadevatāniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtāṃ puraskṛtāṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānāṃ sarvabodhisattvajanmasamudranirdeśaṃ nāma sūtrāntaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāṃ tathāgatagotrābhijātānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ guṇasamudravegavivardhanām |
S04n349:4: upetya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīlumbinīvanadevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha-mayā devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam |
S04n349:5: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvā jātā bhavanti tathāgatakule,
S04n349:7: evamukte sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīrlumbinīvanadevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat-daśemāni kulaputra bodhisattvajanmāni yaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā jātā bhavanti tathāgatakuleṣu |
S04n349:9: na vitiṣṭhante na viṣīdanti na vivartante na pratiprasrabhyante na parikhidyante na saṃsīdanti na muhyanti nāvalīyante na paritrasyanti na praṇaśyanti |
S04n349:32: iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ ādita eva buddhopasthānāya prapūjyate sarvabuddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan upatiṣṭhan ārāgayan avirāgayan tathāgatadarśanāvitṛpto buddhasatkāraprayuktabuddhaprītivegavivardhitacetāstathāgatadarśanaprasādavegasaṃjātaḥ |
S04n349:33: anivartayā śraddhayā puṇyaṃ samārjayan atṛptaḥ sarvatathāgatapūjāsaṃbhārasamudānayanaprayukto'pratiprasrabdhaprayogo bhavati |
S04n349:34: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhapūjopasthānapraṇidhiprayogagarbhaṃ nāma prathamaṃ bodhisattvajanma sarvajñatāsaṃbhārakuśalamūlasaṃbhavasamārjanatāyai saṃvartate ||
S04n349:48: idaṃ kulaputra bodhicittāṅgapariniṣpattisaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma dvitīyaṃ bodhisattvajanma ||
S04n349:49: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ dharmanayanidhyaptiprayoganetryabhimukhasaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma tṛtīyaṃ bodhisattvajanma?
S04n349:52: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ tryadhvalokādhyāśayaviśuddhigarbhaṃ nāma caturthaṃ bodhisattvajanma?
S04n349:64: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ tryadhvalokādhyāśayaviśuddhigarbhaṃ nāma caturthaṃ bodhisattvajanma ||
S04n349:65: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ samantāvabhāsaprabhāgarbhaṃ nāma pañcamaṃ bodhisattvajanma?
S04n349:66: iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ prayogasaṃpanno bhavati sarvajagatparipākavinayapratipannaḥ |
S04n349:76: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ samantāvabhāsaprabhāgarbhaṃ nāma pañcamaṃ bodhisattvajanma ||
S04n349:77: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ sarvatathāgatakulagotrasaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ bodhisattvajanma?
S04n349:78: iha kulaputra bodhisattvo jāto bhavati tathāgatakule'nujāto bhavati,
S04n349:87: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ sarvatathāgatakulagotrasaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ bodhisattvajanma ||
S04n349:88: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabalāvabhāsālokālaṃkāragarbhaṃ nāma saptamaṃ bodhisattvajanma?
S04n349:89: iha kulaputra bodhisattvo buddhabalapraveśāvabhāse na nivartate buddhakṣetragamaneṣu |
S04n349:98: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabalāvabhāsālokālaṃkāragarbhaṃ nāma saptamaṃ bodhisattvajanma ||
S04n349:100: iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ kumārabhūta eva bodhisattvavyavasthānavyavasthito bhavati,
S04n349:102: ekaikatra jñānanayamukhe'prameyāḥ kalpāḥ kṣayaṃ vrajeyuraprameyaṃ bodhisattvagocaraṃ nirdiśataḥ |
S04n349:109: aprameyāṃ ca dharmatāṃ parīttāṃ mahadgatāṃ vā pratividhyati |
S04n349:113: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ dharmadhātunirmāṇavyūhagarbhaṃ nāma bodhisattvajanma?
S04n349:114: iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ sarvatra cittakṣaṇe nānāvyūhāni buddhakṣetrāṇi adhitiṣṭhati |
S04n349:126: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ dharmadhātunirmāṇavyūhagarbhaṃ nāma navamaṃ bodhisattvajanma ||
S04n349:127: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabhūmyākramaṇavegagarbhaṃ nāma daśamaṃ bodhisattvajanma?
S04n349:128: iha kulaputra bodhisattvo vivikto bhavati sarvatryadhvatathāgataikībhāvaviṣaye |
S04n349:134: sarvakalpasaṃvartavivartakalpānāṃ ca pūrvāntāparāntapratyuatpannānāṃ sanāmnāṃ sopadeśānāmānantaryaṃ prajānāti |
S04n349:137: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabhūmyākramaṇavegagarbhaṃ nāma daśamaṃ bodhisattvajanma ||
S04n349:138: imāni kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ daśa bodhisattvajanmāni yeṣu bodhisattvā jāyante upapadyante samarjayanti saṃvardhayanti pratipūrayanti saṃbhavanti parisaṃbhavanti pariniṣpadyante |
S04n349:148: atha khalu sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīrlumbinīvanadevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva bodhisattvajanmārthamabhidyotayantī buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata—
S04n349:150: paśyanti ye jina na jātu bhavanti tṛptāḥ |
S04n349:154: kṣetrāṇi sarva tatha dharma tathaiva buddhān |
S04n349:157: ye dharmamegha pibamāna na jātu tṛptāḥ
S04n349:172: ṣaṣṭhaṃ idaṃ vipula janma vidūna teṣām ||6 ||
S04n349:185: ye te yathābala jināna tathā praviṣṭāḥ
S04n349:189: ebhiḥ kulaputra bodhisattvo daśabhirjanmabhistathāgatakule jāta evamālokakaro bhavati sarvasattvānām |
S04n349:190: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra ahamaprameyakalpasarvārambaṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśanasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī |
S04n349:193: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya vipulaṃ janmasamudramavatarāmi |
S04n349:194: yaduta asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau bodhisattvajanma avataramāṇā bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmiha jambudvīpe lumbinīvane bodhisattvajanmasaṃdarśane pūrvapraṇidhānopapannā |
S04n349:205: punaḥ sarvamidaṃ lumbinīvanaṃ divyasamatikrāntagandhāṅkuraprarūḍhaṃ sarvacūrṇakośasaṃbhūtaṃ sarvadhvajameghapaṭalamaṇḍalajātaṃ gandhamaṇivigrahavṛkṣamūlaparisaṃsthāpitālaṃkāraṃ samavāsthiṣata |
S04n349:209: punaḥ sarvasminniha lumbinīvane sarvavṛkṣeṣu mahāmaṇiratnakośā abhinirvṛttāḥ |
S04n349:211: punaḥ sarvasminniha lumbinīvane sarvanalinīṣu sarvāṇi jalajaratnapuṣpāṇi śuṅgībhūtāni dharaṇitalādabhyudgamya vārisamudgatāni samavāsthiṣanta |
S04n349:213: punaryāvanta iha lokadhātau kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāśca devaputrā nāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā lokendrajagadindrā vā,
S04n349:214: te'pyasmin lumbinīvane sarve kṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ sthitā abhūvan |
S04n349:216: punaryāvanta iha cāturdvīpikāyāṃ lokadhātau devakanyā vā nāgakanyā vā yakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragakanyā vā,
S04n349:217: tāḥ sarvāḥ pramuditamānasāḥ sarvapūjāvidhiparigṛhītahastāḥ plakṣaśākhābhimukhāḥ praṇatakāyāḥ sthitā abhūvan |
S04n349:219: punardaśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvatathāgatānāṃ nābhimaṇḍalebhyo niścaramāṇā bodhisattvajanmavikurvitapradīpā nāma raśmayo niścaritvā sarvamidaṃ lumbinīvanamavabhāsya tiṣṭhanti sma |
S04n349:220: teṣu ca sarvaraśmimukhamaṇḍaleṣu teṣāṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ janmavikurvitāni pratibhāsaprāptāni saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n349:221: saṃprasavavikurvitāḥ sarvabodhisattvaguṇāśca buddhasvarasaṃprayuktāstebhyo raśmimukhamaṇḍalebhyo niścaramāṇāḥ śrūyante sma |
S04n349:223: imāni daśa pūrvanimittāni prādurbhūtāni bodhisattvajanmakālasamaye pratyupasthite,
S04n349:224: yeṣāṃ prādurbhāvādvitarkamabhavat sarvalokendrāṇāṃ bodhisattvo janiṣyata iti |
S04n349:225: sā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra eṣāṃ daśānāṃ pūrvanimittānāṃ darśanādacintyaṃ prītivegaṃ pratilabhe ||
S04n349:226: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyādevyāḥ kapilavastuno mahānagarānniṣkramantyā iha lumbinīvane daśa mahāvabhāsapūrvanimittāni prādurabhūvan,
S04n349:249: tatra kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ plakṣadrumanilayagatāyāḥ saṃnipatitānāṃ sarvalokendrāṇāṃ sarvakāmadhātukānāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ sāpsarogaṇadevakanyāparivārāṇāṃ saṃnipatitānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ nirāmagandhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇāṃ saparivārāṇāṃ saṃnipatitānāṃ bodhisattvapūjāsaṃprayuktānāṃ māyādevyāstejasā śriyā varṇena rūpeṇa sarvapūjāvyūhāḥ kāyāścāvabhāsitā babhūvuḥ,
S04n349:250: asyāṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau yāḥ prabhāḥ,
S04n349:252: sarvaromavivaravisṛtāśca māyādevyāḥ prabhāvabhāsāstadanyābhiḥ prabhābhiranupahatā anāvṛtā apravyāhṛtā asaṅgāḥ sarvadiśaḥ spharitvā sarvāṇi nairayikāṇi duḥkhāni sarvāṇi tairyagyonikāni duḥkhāni sarvāṇi ca yāmalaukikāni duḥkhāni sarvabhavagatiparyāpannānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhāni saṃkleśāṃśca praśamayitvā tiṣṭhanti bhāsante tapanti virocante sma |
S04n349:253: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane prathamaṃ janmavikurvitam ||
S04n349:254: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yasmin samaye māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣau sarvāvatīyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrā lokadhāturantargatā pratibhāsaprāptā saṃdṛśyate sma,
S04n349:255: tasyāṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau koṭīśatacāturdvīpikānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sarve jambudvīpeṣu nānānāmadheyāsu rājadhānīṣu nānānāmadheyeṣu vanaṣaṇḍeṣu nānāvṛkṣamūleṣu māyādevī upagatā evameva saṃdṛśyate sma sarvalokendraparivṛtā bodhisattvajanmapratyupasthānā acintyena bodhisattvajananījñānavikurvitena |
S04n349:256: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane dvitīyaṃ janmavikurvitam ||
S04n349:257: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromavivarebhya ekaikasmādromamukhādyāvanto bhagavatā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā tathāgatā ārāgitāḥ satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitā pūjitāḥ,
S04n349:260: sa sarvastebhyo romavivarebhyo buddhasvarāṅgasaṃprayukto nikhilena śrūyate sma |
S04n349:261: tadyathāpi nāma vārirāśe rajasi kanakaparamāṇurajasi vā ādarśamaṇḍale vā svacche suprasanne vā udake gaganamaṇḍalamādityacandrajyotigrahagaṇapratimaṇḍitaṃ gambhīrameghapaṭalanigarjitanirghoṣapratibhāsaprāptaṃ saṃdṛśyate sma,
S04n349:262: evameva kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromamukhamaṇḍaleṣu pūrvatathāgatavikurvitāni saṃdṛśyante sma sarvadharmadeśanānirghoṣāṇi |
S04n349:263: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane tṛtīyaṃ janmavikurvitam ||
S04n349:264: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ sarvakāyātsarvaromamukhamaṇḍalebhya ekaikasmādromavivarādyāvatsu sarvakṣetreṣu yāvatsu lokadhātusamudreṣu yāvatsu lokadhātuvaṃśeṣu yāvatsu lokadhātusaṃjñāgateṣu bhagavān bodhisattvacārikāmakārṣīt |
S04n349:265: yatpratiṣṭhāneṣu kṣetreṣu yatsaṃsthāneṣu yadvyūheṣu yaccharīreṣu yatparvatālaṃkāreṣu yadgrāmanagaranigamajanapadapaṭṭanālaṃkāreṣu yadudyānanadīhṛdataḍāgasāgarālaṃkāreṣu yadgaganameghālaṃkāreṣu yatsattvanilayeṣu yadyānanirdeśeṣu yatkalpanāmasaṃkhyāsu yadbuddhotpādaprabhaveṣu yadviśuddhiparameṣu yathāyuḥpramāṇasattveṣu yathālokajanmopapattiṣu yathāsattvasamavadhāneṣu yathākalyāṇamitrasaṃniśrayeṣu yathākuśaladharmaprayogeṣu yathādharmapratipatyabhiyogeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvacārikāmacaran,
S04n349:266: te sarve buddhakṣetraprasarā māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromamukhebhyaḥ saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n349:270: sarveṣu ca teṣu tāsu tāsūpapattiṣu māyādevī bodhisattvasya jananī babhūva |
S04n349:271: sarve ca te bodhisattvakāyā māyāyā devyā romavivareṣu vikurvitapratibhāsaprāptāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n349:272: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane caturthaṃ janmavikurvitam ||
S04n349:273: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yāvadbhiḥ kāyairbhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāmacarat yadvarṇairyatsaṃsthānairyadākārairyatparibhogairyatsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedībhiryajjātiparivartaiḥ,
S04n349:274: te sarve māyāyā devyāḥ kāye sarvaromamukheṣu pratibhāsaprāptāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n349:275: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya pañcamaṃ janmavikurvitam ||
S04n349:276: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yāvanto bhagavatā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caratā duṣkaraparityāgāḥ parityaktāḥ,
S04n349:277: hastapādaparityāgā vā karṇanāsāparityāgā vā jihvādaṃṣṭrāparityāgā vā nayanottamāṅgaparityāgā vā māṃsaśoṇitaparityāgā vā asthimajjāparityāgā vā vakṣohṛdayaparityāgā vā chavicarmaparityāgā vā bāhyādhyātmikavastuparityāgā vā putraduhitṛbhāryāparityāgā vā ātmabhāvaparityāgā vā bhogaratnaparityāgā vā grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīparityāgā vā dhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraparityāgā vā maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajataparityāgā vā vividharatnābharaṇaparityāgā vā śayyāsanaparityāgā vā gṛhavimānaparityāgā vā sarvopabhogaparityāgā vā,
S04n349:278: te ca dāyakabodhisattvavigrahakāyai rūpaiḥ parityajanti sma |
S04n349:279: te ca pratigrāhakāyai rūpaiḥ pratigṛhṇanti sma |
S04n349:283: sarve te māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromavivarebhyaḥ pratibhāsaprāptāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n349:284: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya ṣaṣṭhaṃ janmavikurvitam ||
S04n349:285: punaraparaṃ kulaputra ....................... lumbinīvanaṣaṇḍe samavasṛtā abhijātajagadvijñānā prādurabhavat |
S04n349:286: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya saptamaṃ janmavikurvitam ||
S04n349:288: yaduta sarvamaṇirājakūṭāgāraparibhogā vā maṇirājavimānaparibhogā vā maṇirājajālaparibhogā vā maṇirājavigrahaparibhogā vā maṇirājabimbaparibhogā vā maṇirājavyūhā vā sarvābharaṇaparibhogā vā sarvagandharājaparibhogā vā śubhāpratikūlasarvārambaṇaparibhogā vā,
S04n349:289: te sarve māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣeranyonyāsaṃbhinnā niścaritvā iha lumbinīvane samantavyūhāḥ samavāsthiṣanta |
S04n349:291: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣeḥ prathamataraṃ daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā bhagavato vairocanasya sadṛśarūpavarṇasaṃsthānāḥ sadṛśalakṣaṇānuvyañjanālaṃkārāḥ sadṛśaprabhāḥ sadṛśaraśmipramuñcanāḥ sadṛśaliṅgalīlāḥ sadṛśavikramāḥ sadṛśavirocanavikurvitāḥ sadṛśaparivārāḥ sadṛśavyūhā niścaranti sma bhagavato varṇasamudrānudīrayamāṇāḥ |
S04n349:292: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya navamaṃ janmavikurvitam ||
S04n349:293: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye pravṛtte māyāyā devyāḥ purastādadho vajratalānmahāpṛthivīmabhinirbhidya sarvaratnavyūhagarbhaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnapadmamabhyudgatamabhūdaparājitamahāvajramaṇirājagarbhasarvamaṇirājakesararaśmivyūhaṃ daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamapatrapaṅktisuvibhaktaṃ vividhamaṇirājapatramaṇḍalaṃ cintāmaṇirājaviśuddhakarṇikaṃ sarvaratnavarṇāprameyakesarapaṅktivyūham,
S04n349:295: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya daśamaṃ janmavikurvitam ||
S04n349:296: imāni kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya daśa janmavikurvitāni prādurabhūvan |
S04n349:297: tataḥ paścādbodhisattvo'cintyāpramāṇaprabhāsecanakadarśano māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣerabhyudgataḥ sūryamaṇḍalamiva gaganatalāt,
S04n349:301: ityevaṃ bodhisattvo māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣerabhiniṣkramaṇaṃ saṃdarśayāmāsa māyāgatarūpavijñaptisaṃdarśanadharmatayā anāgatadharmatayā anutpādānirodhalokavijñaptisaṃdarśanadharmatayā ||
S04n349:302: ityevamahaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitasamudrānavatarāmi iha lumbinīvane viharamāṇā |
S04n349:303: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra syāṃ bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitasamudrānavatarāmi,
S04n349:304: tathā sarvāvatyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikāsu koṭīśatajambudvīpānāṃ sarvatra bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitānyavatarāmi |
S04n349:305: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikāsu koṭīśatajambudvīpānāṃ bhagavato vairocanasya koṭīśataṃ janmavikurvitānāmavatarāmi,
S04n349:306: evaṃ sarvatrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparyāpannaparamāṇurajontargateṣu sarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥpraveśajñānānugateṣu praticittakṣaṇamekaikena cittapraveśena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitānyavatarāmi |
S04n349:307: tadanantareṇa cittena buddhakṣetrasahasraparamāṇurajontargateṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ekaikatra buddhatatsamānyeva bodhisattvajanmavikurvitānyavatarāmi |
S04n349:308: etena nayena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajontargateṣu buddhakṣetreṣvekaikasmin buddhakṣetre sarvāṇi bodhisattvajanmavikurvitānyavatarāmi,
S04n349:310: sarvaparamāṇurajaḥsu ekaikasmin paramāṇurajasi buddhakṣetraparaṃparāṇāṃ na ca paryantamupaimi sarvakṣetreṣvekaikasmin buddhakṣetre buddhasattvajanmaparaṃparāṇām |
S04n349:312: tathā daśasu dikṣu anantamadhyāsu lokadhātuṣu sarvaparamāṇurajaḥsu praticittakṣaṇamekaikena cittapraveśena sarvākārāṇi sarvabodhisattvajanmavikurvitānyavatarāmyapratiprasrabdhyadhiṣṭhānayogena ||
S04n349:313: evamukte sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyaṃ lumbinīvanadevatāmevamāha kiyaccirapratilabdhastvayāyaṃ devate aprameyakalpasarvārambaṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitaṃ saṃdarśayamāno bodhisattvajanmavimokṣaḥ?
S04n349:314: āha-bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte'dhvani buddhakṣetrakoṭīparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa parataramīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān samantaratnāyāṃ lokadhātau samāpadyate kalpe'śītibuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraprabhave |
S04n349:315: tasyāṃ khalu kulaputra samantaratnāyāṃ lokadhātau vicitravyūhaprabhā nāma madhyamā cāturdvīpikābhūt |
S04n349:316: tasyāṃ khalu cāturdvīpikāyāṃ madhye jambudvīpasya meruviśuddhavyūhadhvajā nāma rājadhānyabhūt |
S04n349:317: tasyāṃ khalu rājadhānyāṃ ratnārcinetraprabho nāma rājā abhūt |
S04n349:318: rājñaḥ khalu kulaputra ratnārcinetraprabhasya rājñaḥ suharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma bhāryābhūt |
S04n349:319: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra asyāṃ bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmiha jambudvīpe māyādevī bhagavato vairocanasya janetrī,
S04n349:320: evameva kulaputra tena kālena tena samayena tasyāṃ vicitravyūhaprabhāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ jambudvīpe suharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma tasya bhagavata īśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajasya tathāgatasya mātā abhūt |
S04n349:321: yathā teṣāmaśītibuddhakoṭīniyutānāṃ pūrvaṃgamasya prāthamakalpikasya bhagavata īśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajasya tathāgatasya mātā abhūt |
S04n349:322: sā khalu kulaputra suharṣitaprabheśvarā devī bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye viṃśatyā strīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ suvarṇapuṣpābhamaṇḍalaṃ nāma mahodyānaṃ niryayau,
S04n349:323: yatra tamīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajaṃ kumāraṃ janayāmāsa acintyena bodhisattvavikurvitena |
S04n349:324: tena khalu punaḥ samayena suvarṇapuṣpābhamaṇḍalasya nāma mahodyānasya madhye śubharatnavicitrakūṭaṃ nāma kūṭāgāramabhūt |
S04n349:325: tasmin kūṭāgāre sarvakāmaṃdadavṛkṣaśākhāmadhyālambatayā suharṣitaprabheśvarāyā devyāḥ sa bhagavānīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajastathāgato janitaḥ |
S04n349:326: tena khalu samayena tasya bhagavato janmakāle vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā nāma dhātrī pratyupasthitābhūt |
S04n349:327: jātamātraṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ lokendrā vicitrasurabhimanojñadivyapuṣpotkarodgāribhiḥ paramasurabhigandhodakakalaśairvisnāpya tadarhābhiśca acintyāsaṃkhyeyābhiruttamābhiḥ pūjābhirabhipūjya tasyā vimalasaṃbhavaprabhāyā dhātryā aṅke prāyacchan |
S04n349:328: parigṛhītamātre ca tasmin bodhisattve tayā dhātryā ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāmaṃse ca,
S04n349:329: tatkṣaṇameva sā dhātrī mahāprītiprāmodyavegapratilabdhā samantacakṣurviṣayaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ pratyalabhata,
S04n349:330: yasya samādheḥ sahapratilābhāttasmāddaśasu dikṣu nānālokadhātusthitā aprameyāstathāgatāścakṣuṣa ābhāsamagaman |
S04n349:331: eṣa ca aprameyakalpasarvārambaṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśano bodhisattvavimokṣo'vakrāntaḥ susūkṣmaḥ tadyathāpi nāma taddivasāvakrānte mātuḥ kukṣau garbhavijñānam,
S04n349:333: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra-anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā nāma bodhisattvadhātryabhūt?
S04n349:335: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā nāma bodhisattvadhātryabhūvam |
S04n349:336: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra-anyāni tena kālena tena samayena viṃśatistrīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhūvan?
S04n349:340: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra-anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena supraharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma devyabhūdīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajasya kumārasya janetrī?
S04n349:342: iyaṃ sā māyādevī tena kālena tena samayena supraharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma devyabhūt |
S04n349:343: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra-anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena ratnārcinetraprabho nāma rājā abhūt |
S04n349:345: ayaṃ sa rājā śuddhodanaḥ tena kālena tena samayen ratnārcinetraprabho nāma rājā abhūt |
S04n349:346: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra tata upādāya sarvacittakṣaṇeṣvavirahitā abhūvaṃ bhagavato vairocanasya bodhisattvajanmavikurvitasāgarāvataraṇatayā sattvanayavṛṣabhitāvikurvitasāgarāvataraṇatayā ||
S04n349:347: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavato vairocanasya mahāpraṇidhānasamudrasāgarasaṃbhavānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sarvacittakṣaṇeṣu sarvaparamāṇurajaḥpraveśasamavasṛtena jñānacakṣuṣā sarvaparamāṇurajaḥsu kṣetrasamudrānavatarāmi,
S04n349:350: tathā daśasu dikṣu anantamadhyānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sarvacittakṣaṇeṣu bodhisattvajanmavikurvitasāgarānavatarāmi |
S04n349:351: yathā ca asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvaparamāṇurajaḥprasaraparaṃparāvatāreṇa samyaksaṃbuddhabodhisattvajanmābhimukhībhāvagatān buddhaguṇānavatarāmi,
S04n349:358: atha khalu sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīrlumbinīvanadevatā evamevāprameyasarvakalpasarvāvaraṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśanabodhisattvavimokṣaṃ paridīpayamānā buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n349:438: ryaṃ na śakya ayu sarva darśitum ||20 ||
S04n349:440: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe sarvakalpaprasthānagarbhasaṃbhūtacittānāṃ sarvadharmanayanidhyaptijātinidarśakānāṃ sarvatathāgatapūjāpraṇidhisaṃbhūtāśayānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmābhisaṃbodhipraṇidhiparamāṇāṃ sarvakulagotropapattigatisaṃdarśanapratibhāsakalpānāṃ sarvatathāgatapādamūlapadmagarbhopapattīnāṃ sarvajagatparipākakālābhijñānāṃ sarvavinayābhimukhajanmopapattivikurvitasaṃdarśakānāṃ sarvakṣetraprasaravikurvitameghasaṃdarśakānāṃ sarvajagadgatijātikulapratibhāsaprāptānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum ||
S04n349:442: iyamihaiva kapilavastuni mahānagare gopā nāma śākyakanyā prativasati |
S04n349:443: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha-kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvaparipākāya saṃsāre saṃsaritavyam ||
S04n349:444: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyo lumbinīvanadevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyaṃ lumbinīvanadevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyo lumbinīvanadevatāyā antikātprakrāntaḥ ||40 ||
